title: GRAPH Voting trend depicted in the graph

content.prompt: Which of the following is a likely effect of the trend depicted in the bar graph on voting and elections?

choices.label: There will be fewer restrictions placed on voting.
Voter turnout is likely to increase among non-Whites.
Voter turnout will likely become more diverse.
There will be more retrospective voting among young voters.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
